name: Angy
description:
ANGY is a game that puts two players against each other in a golf-like battle. The lemmings roll into balls and have a grand tournament to see who will come out victorious and who will explode in anger. Utilize your skills and abilities to collect more berries than your enemy, cause this is life or death!

  • Connect with all the mushrooms
  • Steal berries from enemy lemming
  • The last mushroom transforms into the hole
  • First lemming to enter the hole set the score for that map
  • The player with the most berries across the map collection wins!

We are still early in the development! Feedback and suggestions are welcomed.

Game by: Flat Earth Entertainment Team Lead & 3D Artist - Fredrik Johnsen Programmer - Leo-Kristoffer Røreng Programmer - Gabe Danilov 2D Artist - Tian-Chen Huang
